alert.note: Alert for Crisp (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crisp County through 1000 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, or 8 miles west of Cordele, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Arabi, East Crisp, Fort Early, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Raines, Tremont, and Wenona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
